Curriculum Vitae

Professional Experience

2016–2017

Very

Product Advisor & Design Practice Steward

Very is a design and development agency that works with early stage startups, helping them iterate to a minimum viable product launch.

2013–2016

Automattic, Inc.

Team Lead & User Experience Designer

Automattic is a fully-distributed software development company. They are the makers of WordPress.com, WooCommerce, Jetpack, Simplenote, Longreads, VaultPress, Akismet, Gravatar, Polldaddy, Cloudup, and more.

2012

Readmill

Product Designer

Readmill was an ebook reading app for iOS and Android.

2011

Fastspot

Senior User Experience Designer

Fastspot is an interactive agency, founded in 2001 and headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland. They work collaboratively with clients and partners in order to deliver outstanding, award-winning digital experiences.

2006–2008

Medium

Product Designer

Medium was a full service creative consultancy, shaping design and software to offer innovative and effective business solutions to companies of all sizes.

2005–2006

Slaughter Group

Graphic Designer

Slaughter Group is a multidisciplinary branding and design firm that focuses on brand design, graphic design, product design, interior design, garden design, architectural design, and interactive design projects.

Pedadgogical Experience

2011

Indiana University of Pennsylvania

Assistant Professor

I taught the following undergraduate courses: Introduction to Typography, Introduction to Graphic Design, and Interaction Design Elements.

2010

University of Baltimore

Adjuct Faculty

I taught a course on Graphic Design in Branding to a graduate cohort as part of the University's degree program in Communications.

2010

Maryland Institute College of Art

Adjuct Faculty

I taught undergraduate coursework in designing for interactive experiences.

Education

2008–2010

Maryland Institute College of Art

Master of Fine Art, Graphic Design

1997–2003

University of Tennessee at Chattanooga

Bachelor of Fine Art, Graphic Design
